metadata.name: Brinavess 20 MG ML Injection solution concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for the rapid conversion of recent onset of atrial fibrillation to sinus rhythm in adults for non surgery patients that lasts for less than 7 days of duration and post cardiac surgery patients with atrial fibrillation lasting less than 3 days of duration

contraindications.disease: Some common unwanted effects include hypotension ventricular arrhythmias bradycardia atrial flutter dysgeusia paraesthesia dizziness and nausea
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Vernakalant blocks currents in all phases of atrial action potential including atria specific potassium currents the ultra rapid delayed rectifier and the acetylcholine dependent potassium currents and prolongs the refractory period It dose dependently prolongs atrial refractoriness prolongs AV nodal conduction and refractoriness and slightly prolongs QRS duration without significantly affecting ventricular refractory period Vernakalant has a high affinity to ion channels specifically involved in repolarization of atrial tissue and is thought to have a low proarrhythmic potential

incompatibilities.description: Fingolimod may increase the arrhythmogenic activities of Vernakalant
